room_features:
Room Features

The City View King One Bedroom Suites have beautiful city views and a quintessential Manhattan charm. These Suites measure 800 square feet, offer four-fixture bathrooms and are situated on floors 5 to 20.

Bed & Bath Experience

This one-bedroom suite offers captivating views of New York City’s skyline. The suite offers an entry way with double door closet, a well-appointed living room featuring a comfortable sofa and coffee table overlooking the 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar. There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room.

The comfortable bedroom features either a king sized bed or twin beds, anarm chair with side table on the far side of the room.  The twin bed set up has a nightstand between both beds with Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock.The four fixture Turkish marble-clad bathroom features a glass enclosed shower, soaking tub with oversized showerheads, plush bathrobes, towels and luxurious Etro bath amenities.
service_amenities:
Service includes 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants, Complimentary hotel Jaguar service subject to availability, an Award-winning Les Clefs d'Or Concierge team to assist guests.

In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi-fi for up to 4 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes & Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, complimentary dog amenities (for pets up to 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in. For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
